question: The Ministry of Agriculture has set the target for production of which agricultural commodity at 298.3 million tonnes, for the 2020-21 crop year?
explanation:
The Ministry of Agriculture has set the target for production of food grains at 298.3 million tonnes for the 2020-21 crop year, during the National virtual Conference on Kharif crops 2020.
This target is 2 per cent above the estimated production of 291.95 million tonnes in the 2019-20 crop year. The increase in target follows the IMD forecast about a normal monsoon. Target for production of rice and wheat have been fixed at 117.5 million tonnes and 106.5 million tonnes respectively.
